content:
In https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.5.0-beta.5/specs/deneb/p2p-interface.md#blob_sidecar_subnet_id the
> _[IGNORE]_ The sidecar is the first sidecar for the tuple `(block_header.slot, block_header.proposer_index, blob_sidecar.index)` with valid header signature, sidecar inclusion proof, and kzg proof.

condition did not interact well in Nimbus Pectra devnet-6 with the proposer slashings going on, because then it undermined gossip. We worked around it, but Is this intentional?
